description: These rabbit emojis on the other hand use slashes to make hanging straight down sort of ears. These ears actually look more like rabbits because / and \ are long enough that there is no chance the rabbit emoticon will be confused with a dog. Notice that the slashes are always moving downward in order to achieve the bunny ear look. The letter x makes a popular mouth in this list. ／(･ × ･)＼ ／(^ x ^)＼ ／(^ x ^=)＼ ／(=๏ x ๏=)＼ ／(=´x`=)＼ ／(=∵=)＼ ／(=⌒x⌒=)＼ ／(=✪ x ✪=)＼ ／(≡・ x ・≡)＼ ／(≧ x ≦)＼ ／(v x v)＼ ／(=∵=)＼ ／(≡・ x ・≡)＼ / (,,๏ ⋏ ๏,,)＼ ／(￫ x ◕=)＼ ／(◕ x < )＼ ／(◕ x ≦ )＼ / (ㅇㅅㅇ❀)＼ / (•ㅅ•)＼ / (´･×･`)＼ / (,,Ő ｘ Ő,,)＼ / (⁎˃ᆺ˂)＼ / (´・×・｀)＼ / (╹ૅ×╹ૅ)＼ / ( ÒㅅÓ)＼ / (⁎˃ᆺ˂)＼ / ( ´•̥×•̥` )＼
title: Straight Down Ears
